articles.headline: Stud vendors relocate to U-Mall after complaints
articles.author: Luke Xavier Londres
articles.news_body: After receiving reports of public interference and uncontrolled products, student vendors stationed near the College of Arts and Sciences and  Old College of Economics, Management and Development Studies building were relocated to University Mall (U-Mall), Apr. 21.
articles.imageAlt: Sign showing student vendors relocated to U-Mall

articles.headline: CvSU campuses unite for 2025 culture and arts festival
articles.author: Michael Angelo Barcenas
articles.news_body: Different campuses and colleges from Cavite State University gather to celebrate and compete for the 2025 Culture and the Arts Festival, May 28.

articles.headline: 24th Journsem highlights watchdog reporting
articles.author: Luke Xavier Londres
articles.news_body: Magnifying the importance of community watchdogs, student-journalists from Cavite State University and other local institutions gathered for “24:00 The Timely and Timeless Duties of Filipino Journalists,” International Convention Center, May 26.
